page.title: 02Lower Bayston Farm.
page.content: Mr.Jones'farm is at the end of Burgs Lane,Bayston Hill.The farm house is the oldest house in the village.He mainly grows sugar beet,barley,grass, and potatoes(photo D),but he does have 200 ewes and 370 lambs as well.He has a combine harvester for combining the barley and potato harvester which needs 8 people to work it. This is what Mr.Jones does each month {JANUARY_}Ploughing;{FEBRUARY_}Lambing; {MARCH_}Lambing;{APRIL_}Sowing potatoes beet,and spring barley;{MAY_}Spraying weeds and shearing;{JUNE_}Hay making; {JULY_}Lifting potatoes; { {AUGUST_}combining winter barley;{ {SEPTEMBER_}Combining spring wheat and barley. {OCTOBER_}Ploughing for winter wheat and barley,and harvesting beet. {NOVEMBER_}Lifting sugar beet. {DECEMBER_}Still lifting beet.
